response.overview: Blake (Blake Blossom) spies a sexy new neighbor (Michael Vegas) and tells her BFF (Dani West) about him. Dani and Blake both love spontaneous sexual encounters so when Blake tells Dani she’s going to hook-up with him, she’s not the least bit surprised. After hearing all about Blake’s afternoon romp, a horny Dani decides to visit the sexy neighbor for herself. It isn’t long before the sexy hunk-of-a-new-neighbor finds out if he can handle both of these cock-craving firecrackers at the same time.
response.title: Like a Good Neighbor
